getInfo().Description: Gets the @B_android#graphics#pdf#PdfDocument#PageInfo_E@ with meta-data for the page.

Returns: The canvas if the page is not finished, null otherwise.
getCanvas().Description: Gets the @B_android#graphics#Canvas_E@ of the page. Inverse path clipping performed via @B_android#graphics#Canvas#clipPath_E@ for @B_android#graphics#Region#Op#REVERSE_DIFFERENCE_E@ operations. @B_android#graphics#Canvas#drawVertices_E@ Color filters set via @B_android#graphics#Paint#setColorFilter_E@ Mask filters set via @B_android#graphics#Paint#setMaskFilter_E@ Some XFER modes such as @B_android#graphics#PorterDuff#Mode#SRC_ATOP_E@, @B_android#graphics#PorterDuff#Mode#DST_ATOP_E@, @B_android#graphics#PorterDuff#Mode#XOR_E@, @B_android#graphics#PorterDuff#Mode#ADD_E@

ClassDesc: This class represents a PDF document page. It has associated a canvas on which you can draw content and is acquired by a call to @B_android#graphics#pdf#PdfDocument#Page#getCanvas_E@. It also has associated a @B_android#graphics#pdf#PdfDocument#PageInfo_E@ instance that describes its attributes. Also a page has
